mean_cn: n. 拉链；  vt. 用拉链扣住；  vi. 拉上拉链
mean_en: a thing that you use to fasten clothes, bags, etc. It consists of two rows of metal or plastic teeth that you can pull together to close something or pull apart to open it.
sentence: To get into this purse you need to open the zipper.
sentence_trans: 你得拉开拉链才能打开这个钱包。
word_etyma: zip拉链 + per名词后缀 → zipper拉链
